price: 6 afin que tu avertisses un peuple dont les ancêtres n’ont pas été avertis, si bien qu’ils vivent dans l’insouciance.
arabic: لِتُنذِرَ قَوۡمٗا مَّآ أُنذِرَ ءَابَآؤُهُمۡ فَهُمۡ غَٰفِلُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: litundhira qawman mā undhira ābāuhum fahum ghāfilūna
